name: Sunny Cafe Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

publishers: Interwise Multimedia Corp. 英特衛多媒體股份有限公司
short_description: This music is the original soundtrack of the game "Sunny Cafe". The original soundtrack of the game contains the theme song "Day I Dream" and 12 other songs. While listening to the relaxed and lazy music melody, let's brew a cup of fragrant coffee together, and sink in this romantic Sunny Cafe!
